name: Living CARBON
description:
Calling all nature lovers to our creatures of carbon walkthrough.

Carbon is essential to living things of all shapes and sizes. How does carbon eat, breathe, walk, meow or quack? In this walkthrough, explore the various life forms hidden in the exhibits at the gallery, and revel in the diversity of carbon-based life.

name: Women and CARBON
description:
Look at CARBON with gender-tinted glasses!

Walk with us as we explore the nuanced ways in which women appear in CARBON as scientists, artists and the art. Let’s break into the silos of science, culture, and experimentation to witness its entanglement with the notions of gender.

name: CARBON Scouting
description: A treasure hunt-based exploration of the CARBON exhibition and the Gallery. Bring your inner Indiana Jones vibe to crack cryptic codes and find the treasure. We promise you that knowledge will not be the only treasure you will walk away with.

name: Sensing CARBON
description: How can we understand CARBON through our senses? What can you see, hear, smell, and touch? Join our mediators Divya and Risha as they take you through a multisensory experience (in their perspective) of CARBON and technology as an extension of our senses.

name: CARBON Conversations : Art x Science
description: Experience Science Gallery Bengaluru’s current exhibition-season CARBON on a walkthrough led by mediators Puja and Jagath. Puja, an Art Practitioner and Jagath, a Biochemist by training explore what Carbon means to both of them and how their backgrounds have coloured their perceptions about the exhibition. Through the walkthrough they will emphasise how Art-Science interactions are the foundation to the exhibition.
